nodes.title: Simplifying crypto transactions with Banxa
nodes.subtitle: Meet the builders who are transforming web3, in our More With MetaMask Partner Series.

image.title: More with MetaMask Partner Series Banxa
image.description: More with MetaMask Partner Series Banxa

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask is the gateway to the decentralized web, enabling you to do more. Users can connect to any dapp, on any network, from any device. From DeFi to DeSci, gaming to NFTs, and beyond: MetaMask is passionate about the web3 community. Our More With MetaMask Partner Series shines a light on builders who are innovating across the ecosystem. Next up, Banxa.

Navigating crypto used to be a complicated process, but no longer. At Banxa, our mission is to simplify crypto onboarding. As a leading crypto on-ramp and off-ramp solution integrated with MetaMask, we exchange your fiat money for cryptocurrency and vice versa.

Without Banxa, crypto wallets like MetaMask would need numerous integrations, partnerships, and licenses to help their users buy and sell crypto. This process is time-consuming, resource intensive, and involves additional risks and regulatory responsibilities. Banxa handles all of these logistics, so MetaMask can focus on what matters â€“ building web3 products that users love.

Configurable crypto journeys

Tailored experiences: MetaMaskâ€™s configurability ensures the best experience for every customer, whether you are a new or returning user.

Streamlined onboarding: For new users, Banxa minimizes the steps needed to buy and sell crypto.

Effortless transactions: Returning users can complete purchases in just one click without leaving MetaMask app, thanks to prior verification.

Worldwide user reach

MetaMask's commitment to accessibility works in tandem with Banxa's vision of global web3 onboarding. Leveraging MetaMask's user-friendly interface and extensive features, Banxa reaches a wider audience, providing an easy gateway to the world of cryptocurrencies. MetaMaskâ€™s configurability also improves our ability to deliver superior experiences to Banxa users.

Powerful web3 APIs

MetaMask provides a robust suite of web3 APIs that serve as a gold standard for product integration. These APIs offer a seamless and standardized approach for Banxa to connect its services with MetaMask, enabling smooth user experiences and efficient transactions.

By integrating Banxa's smooth on-ramp and off-ramp solutions with MetaMask, we've made it easier than ever for users to navigate the decentralized web. The complexity of crypto is no longer a barrier to entry.

Experience the ease of buying crypto with MetaMask via Banxa today.

Looking for more help? We got you. Learn how to buy crypto on MetaMask.

nodes.metaDescription: Discover how Banxa simplifies crypto transactions with MetaMask integration. Enjoy effortless onboarding, tailored experiences, and powerful web3 APIs.

nodes.subtitle: Stake ETH from your phone â€” wherever and whenever.

image.description: Stake ETH directly in MetaMask mobile app

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask Staking is now available inside MetaMask Mobile App, making it easier than ever to stake crypto with us. You can now stake ETH, view your staked ETH position, and unstake directly from MetaMask App. (Note: this feature is unavailable for UK users, who will be redirected to MetaMask Portfolio interface.)

Our MetaMask Staking mobile update follows the launch of Pooled Staking in the US earlier this year â€” allowing users to stake any amount of ETH directly with MetaMask, and earn rewards. US users will now be able to access MetaMask Pooled Staking in both the MetaMask App and in MetaMask Portfolio.

Dive into MetaMask Staking on the MetaMask App now, available for iOS and Android. Need more help? We got you. Check out our MetaMask Support guide to staking.

nodes.metaDescription: MetaMask Mobile app now supports staking ETH natively, making Pooled Staking, Liquid Staking, and Validator Staking easier than ever.

nodes.title: Web3 gaming enters its new era with HyperPlay
nodes.subtitle: Meet the builders who are transforming web3, in our More With MetaMask Partner Series.

image.title: More Secure with MetaMask and HyperPlay
image.description: More Secure with MetaMask and HyperPlay image

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MetaMask is the gateway to the decentralized web, enabling you to do more. Users can connect to any dapp, on any network, from any device. From DeFi to DeSci, gaming to NFTs, and beyond: MetaMask is passionate about the web3 community. Our More With MetaMask Partner Series shines a light on builders who are innovating across the ecosystem.

HyperPlay was founded to build a secure, censorship-resistant, free-market gaming platform. We were, and still are, driven by offering greater flexibility and ownership than the web2 paradigm, while also providing a safer cross-platform experience. Thanks to our efforts, today we are entering a new era of gaming.

Replacing the old formula

While the web2 gaming world continues to cling to its old ways, HyperPlayâ€™s web3-friendly game store allows players to carry their in-game assets across all games, offering them true ownership and autonomy, without fear of de-platforming. MetaMask wallet is a key integration, eliminating obstacles for gamers and developers alike.

HyperPlayâ€™s game store brings token swaps, cross-chain bridging, and easy cash to crypto on-ramping into every game through our in-game overlay. This overlay is powered by MetaMask Portfolio, making it secure and easy for gamers to access all of these functions no matter what game they're playing. Wallet transactions take place without leaving a game â€” reducing friction, improving safety, and preserving immersive experiences.

Players can use the same trusted wallet across multiple games and marketplaces instead of traipsing from one platform to the next with a handful of proprietary wallets. Gamers can play their entire existing games library in the HyperPlay app including from other stores like Epic Games and GOG, and combine this library with the games from HyperPlayâ€™s own official store, all gathered in a single gaming hub.

Our new user experience

By eliminating the need to leave the game to manage assets, HyperPlayâ€™s MetaMask overlay experience enhances gaming immersion â€” assets can be managed without skipping a beat. Reducing friction in web3 gaming is crucial for encouraging adoption â€” and bringing tokens and in-game collectibles closer to the action increases their utility. Assets that players own should be a joy to use rather than a burden. Streamlining and strengthening the transaction process doesn't just help players, it unlocks new opportunities for developers to innovate and better serve their audiences.

MetaMask Portfolio offers a secure, simple way to explore the web3 gaming universe, featuring HyperPlay's curated list of MetaMask-compatible games, which make it even easier to onboard new players to web3.

Securely powering gamers into the future

HyperPlayâ€™s MetaMask integration also results in another essential benefit: a safer onboarding experience. The HyperPlay app allows for MetaMask transactions to be visible on-screen without the need to leave or even minimize the gaming experience, all while preserving the privacy of user keys. Secret recovery phrases are never exposed to games, and can even be kept off the gaming computer itself.

For an extra layer of protection, HyperPlay and MetaMask offer users an external signing feature powered by MetaMask Mobile, which keeps keys off the playerâ€™s device. With MetaMask Mobile, gamers can send transactions to an external mobile device, providing a secure connection method that acts as an additional barrier against any potential security compromise.

Combining the innovative tech of HyperPlayâ€™s game store with the ironclad safety of MetaMask Portfolioâ€™s in-game overlay is a powerful partnership. Gone are the days where gamers have to hop out of game screens at a critical moment to swap tokens, bridge networks, or buy crypto with fiat. The future of gaming is now.

Leave outdated gaming platforms behind and immerse yourself in web3 gaming by exploring HyperPlay today.

nodes.metaDescription: Find out how MetaMask and HyperPlay are ushering in a new era of web3 gaming that is secure and powerful.
